pageContent:
![overment-photo]($1)

This is a place where I share everything I know. I created this space mainly for myself. At the same time, I figured you might find it just as valuable.

Please remember that this project will never be complete. What's most crucial is that many things will change over time, because **what's true for me today, might not be true tomorrow** — that's my approach to an ever-changing world.

## The most important topics: [#](#the-most-important-topics)

* My [Process]($2) which allows me to move in the [Direction]($3) I have set for myself, based on my [Values]($4) and [Knowing thyself](./Core/Knowing thyself.html)
* How I learn based on my [Learning System](./Core/Learning System.html)
* Everything I know about [Mental Models](./Mental Models/Mental Models.html)
* My thoughts about [Books]($5) I read
* A list and my thoughts about [Apps]($6)
* Thoguhts about my [Hardware]($7)
* Perspective and ideas about [Automation]($8)s
* Notes on Programming, Design, Marketing and Business.
* Notes about my [Process]($2)
* My all free and paid publications

## Where you can find me? [#](#where-you-can-find-me)

I like talking to people, so if there's anything you need to tell me or want to share, don't hesitate. If I don't respond, please don't take it personally, but still — I'll do my best.

You can find me on [Instagram]($9), [YouTube]($10), [Medium]($11) and [Twitter]($12)

Feel free to contact me — adam a^t. [overment.com]($13)
